title: Student of the Year
writer: Renzil D'Silva, Niranjan Iyengar, Karan Johar
short_cast: Sidharth Malhotra, Alia Bhatt, Varun Dhawan, Rishi Kapoor, Ronit Roy, Ram Kapoor, Manjot Singh, Sana Saeed
cast: Sidharth Malhotra, Alia Bhatt, Varun Dhawan, Rishi Kapoor, Ronit Roy, Ram Kapoor, Manjot Singh, Sana Saeed
genre: Romantic Comedies, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Comedies, Dramas, Romantic Movies

desc: Rivals turned friends find their bromance tested when they battle it out to win not only a grueling school competition, but also the same girl's heart.
